title: Texture List
description: The texture_list.json file is a simple array of texture paths that should be included in the resource pack. This file helps the game identify which textures are available. Located at textures/texture_list.json in resource packs.

tokens.text: lists all texture paths available in this resource pack

note: This file is a JSON array at the root level, containing string paths to texture files relative to the resource pack root. File extensions are typically omitted.
